pages.text: Goodradigbeeon is a buchanosteid arthrodiran placoderm described from the Devonian strata in Australia. Like other members in family, it had a flat skull, and it was probably a benthic fish, waiting for prey to swim by.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Live Birth$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
